HomeAbout

You creep slowly toward the workers and wave for Rah to follow. What could this boat be doing? And where could it be going? You and Rah listen to what they're saying.

"This is going to be big," The first worker says.

"Whatever, let's just get along with it. The same thing happens to every town. You know the entertainment is just a distraction," says the second worker back to the first.

"Do you think they're going to do those fireworks again? Those were incredible. You'd better not just stay below deck tonight. Soon enough, when we move on with our lives, you'd'a wished you enjoyed these things while we had 'em." As the first worker says this, seemingly ignoring the second worker's response, you and Rah can see a wonder spread across their face.

Rah gives you a look.

"What could this possibly mean?" they whisper.

You wonder the exact same thing. What are they doing here and why here? What do they mean by distraction?

Leave the docks and head homeKeep watching
